title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Curriculum Development: Technology-Supported Mobile Mathematics Learning Design and Engagement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary mathematical concepts and basic mobile device usage capabilities
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply real-time feedback-based math problem-solving strategies in a mobile environment with 80% accuracy.
Learners perform collaborative learning activities with peers more than three times using a social media-like platform.
Learners can describe their participation patterns in three or more ways based on network analysis data collected during the learning process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
